__TOC__

This is the home of Ubuntu Users in Liberia.

Ubuntu Liberia Team is a support team for Ubuntu Linux in Liberia. The Liberia team focuses on advocating, distributing, advertising, demonstrating and developing local attributes into Ubuntu within Liberia. Through the advocacy and development of our projects we focus on the areas of schools, business and home users. Do tasks such as translating packages into local Liberian languages, customized for the Liberian culture.
